.. _`check MD5`:

CHECK MD5
=========

Verify MD5 validity bewteen a provided file and a provided hash





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_check_md5_with_expected_hash_as_file:
        input:
            file = "test.txt",
            hash = "expected.md5"
        output:
            "test.md5"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/check_md5"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

If no expected-hash file is provided, then the hash value should be passed as
a parameter: hash_value




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris
